title: Red Cabbage and Chicken Salad

ingredients.content: 400 g chicken breasts, skinless, diced (2 cm)
250 g red cabbage, core removed, cut in pieces

preparations.content: Place water in mixing bowl. Place Varoma dish in position and weigh in chicken. Cover then steam <b>18 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>. Set Varoma aside and keep warm. Clean mixing bowl.
Place garlic in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add balsamic vinegar, oil, mustard, salt and pepper then mix <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer dressing to a small jug and set aside.
Place onions, red cabbage and carrots in mixing bowl then chop <b>15 sec/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add 30 g reserved dressing and cook <b>5 min/120°C//speed 1<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula. Cook again <b>5 min/120°C//speed 1<b>. Arrange lettuce leaves on a large serving plate. Scatter chopped salad over then add reserved steamed chicken, sliced pear, Brie and walnuts. Pour remaining dressing over then serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Camembert could be used instead of Brie.
The ratio of carrots to cabbage can be changed according to taste.
For a vegetarian version, omit chicken and increase amounts of cheese and nuts.
